tool.name: @BINARY@
tool.description: computes the principal components for A / B compartment analysis
tool.command:
#if str($matrix_conditional.matrix_type) == 'cool': ln -s $matrix_conditional.matrix_cool matrix.cool && #set $matrix_name = 'matrix.cool' #elif str($matrix_conditional.matrix_type) == 'h5': ln -s $matrix_conditional.matrix_h5 matrix.h5 && #set $matrix_name = 'matrix.h5' #end if
hicPCA --matrix '$matrix_name'
#if $outputFormat == 'bigwig' --outputFileName 'pca1.bigwig' 'pca2.bigwig' --format bigwig #elif $outputFormat == 'bedgraph' --outputFileName 'pca1.bedgraph' 'pca2.bedgraph' --format bedgraph #end if
tool.help:
Principal component analysis ============================ `hicPCA` computes two eigenvector files based on the input matrix for an A / B compartment analysis.
Input ----- - the matrix to be analysed
Parameters __________ - Output file format: bigwig or bedgraph
Output ------ Two files with the first and the second eigenvector.
